ud4.3:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṃ carati mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ.
ud4.3:3.3: Atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma yena aññataraṃ rukkhamūlaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
ud4.3:4.1: Atha kho aññataro gopālako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud4.3:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho taṃ gopālakaṃ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
ud4.3:5.1: Atha kho so gopālako bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud4.3:5.2: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
ud4.3:5.4: Atha kho so gopālako bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
ud4.3:6.1: Atha kho so gopālako tassā rattiyā accayena sake nivesane pahūtaṃ appodakapāyāsaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā navañca sappiṃ bhagavato kālaṃ ārocesi:
ud4.3:7.1: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena yena tassa gopālakassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
ud4.3:7.3: Atha kho so gopālako buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ appodakapāyāsena navena ca sappinā sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi.
ud4.3:7.4: Atha kho so gopālako bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ aññataraṃ nīcaṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
ud4.3:7.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho taṃ gopālakaṃ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
ud4.3:7.6: Atha kho acirapakkantassa bhagavato taṃ gopālakaṃ aññataro puriso sīmantarikāya jīvitā voropesi.
ud4.3:8.1: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
ud4.3:8.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
ud4.3:8.4: “yena, bhante, gopālakena ajja buddhappamukho bhikkhusaṅgho appodakapāyāsena navena ca sappinā sahatthā santappito sampavārito so kira, bhante, gopālako aññatarena purisena sīmantarikāya jīvitā voropito”ti.
ud4.3:9.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
